snippet: In the memoir “Blue Water, White Water,” Robert C. Samuels evokes his battle with Guillain-Barré syndrome and the vagaries of hospital life.
abstract: Dr Abigail Zuger reviews book Blue Water, White Water by Robert C Samuels.
lead_paragraph: In the memoir “Blue Water, White Water,” Robert C. Samuels evokes his battle with Guillain-Barré syndrome and the vagaries of hospital life.

headline.seo: ‘Blue Water, White Water’ Review - Sleepless and in Pain, a Patient Watched
headline.main: Sleepless, Bored and in Pain, a Patient Watched
headline.print_headline: Sleepless, Bored and in Pain, a Patient Watched
